name.zh: 多功能周末旅行手提包/圆筒包（多颜色）

description.en: A versatile weekender duffel designed for travel and gym use. Features a spacious main compartment, reinforced carry handles, and an adjustable shoulder strap. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 多功能周末旅行手提包/圆筒包，适合短途旅行与健身使用。主仓空间充足，手提加固，配可调节肩带。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Strap: Adjustable shoulder strap with pad (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节肩带（可选肩垫，可定制）
五金：扣具/D 环等（可定制）

en.Compartments: 1 main compartment + side pocket (optional) + inner pocket (optional)
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 1 主仓 + 侧袋（可选）+ 内袋（可选）
zh.可定制: 配色、面料、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
